[!!!] Merge a hyperSpec object and a data frame

merge.Rd

Merge a hyperSpec object and a data frame.

# S4 method for hyperSpec,data.frame
merge(x, y, ...)

Arguments

x

a hyperSpec object
y

a data.frame object
...

handed to merge.data.frame

Value

A hyperSpec object, with updated slot @data.

See also

merge, merge.

collapse combines hyperSpec objects that do not share the wavelength axis. rbind, and cbind for combining hyperSpec objects that.

Examples


merge(chondro [1:10,, 600], chondro[5:15,, 600]$.., by = c("x", "y"))$.
#>       x     y          filename.x clusters.x <NA>          filename.y
#> 1 -2.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 2 -3.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 3 -4.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 4 -5.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 5 -6.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 6 -7.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix   NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#>   clusters.y
#> 1     lacuna
#> 2     lacuna
#> 3     lacuna
#> 4     lacuna
#> 5     matrix
#> 6     matrix
tmp <- merge (chondro [1:10,, 610], chondro [5:15,, 610]$..,
              by = c("x", "y"), all = TRUE)
tmp$.
#>         x     y          filename.x clusters.x      610          filename.y
#> 1  -11.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 488.6323                <NA>
#> 2  -10.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 489.4758                <NA>
#> 3   -9.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 456.0324                <NA>
#> 4   -8.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 464.8207                <NA>
#> 5   -7.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 428.6620 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 6   -6.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     matrix 426.0734 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 7   -5.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna 412.3674 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 8   -4.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna 398.4772 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 9   -3.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna 412.1881 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 10  -2.55 -4.77 rawdata/chondro.txt     lacuna 392.5067 rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 11  -1.55 -4.77                <NA>       <NA>       NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 12  -0.55 -4.77                <NA>       <NA>       NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 13   0.45 -4.77                <NA>       <NA>       NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 14   1.45 -4.77                <NA>       <NA>       NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#> 15   2.45 -4.77                <NA>       <NA>       NA rawdata/chondro.txt
#>    clusters.y
#> 1        <NA>
#> 2        <NA>
#> 3        <NA>
#> 4        <NA>
#> 5      matrix
#> 6      matrix
#> 7      lacuna
#> 8      lacuna
#> 9      lacuna
#> 10     lacuna
#> 11     lacuna
#> 12     lacuna
#> 13     lacuna
#> 14     lacuna
#> 15     lacuna
wl (tmp)
#> Error in wl(tmp): Argument 'x' must be logical

## remove duplicated wavelengths:
approxfun <- function (y, wl, new.wl){
  approx (wl, y, new.wl, method = "constant",
          ties = function (x) mean (x, na.rm = TRUE)
          )$y
}

merged <- merge (chondro [1:7,, 610 ~ 620], chondro [5:10,, 615 ~ 625], all = TRUE)
merged$.
#>        y      x            filename clusters .nx .ny  spc.610  spc.614  spc.618
#> 1  -4.77 -11.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   1  NA 488.6323 466.1774 492.0016
#> 2  -4.77 -10.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   2  NA 489.4758 465.0506 490.5329
#> 3  -4.77  -9.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   3  NA 456.0324 436.6220 458.0576
#> 4  -4.77  -8.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   4  NA 464.8207 444.8486 470.0172
#> 5  -4.77  -7.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   5   1 428.6620 410.7956 433.1228
#> 6  -4.77  -6.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   matrix   6   2 426.0734 407.8570 431.2145
#> 7  -4.77  -5.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   lacuna   7   3 412.3674 396.5000 421.2738
#> 8  -4.77  -4.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   lacuna  NA   4       NA       NA       NA
#> 9  -4.77  -3.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   lacuna  NA   5       NA       NA       NA
#> 10 -4.77  -2.55 rawdata/chondro.txt   lacuna  NA   6       NA       NA       NA
#>     spc.614  spc.618  spc.622  spc.626
#> 1        NA       NA       NA       NA
#> 2        NA       NA       NA       NA
#> 3        NA       NA       NA       NA
#> 4        NA       NA       NA       NA
#> 5  410.7956 433.1228 461.1903 397.3773
#> 6  407.8570 431.2145 458.1503 394.1776
#> 7  396.5000 421.2738 445.5431 382.7198
#> 8  381.9505 406.2471 429.6729 368.4599
#> 9  397.5075 423.3002 446.1478 381.8675
#> 10 377.3918 402.2349 424.1902 362.4297
merged <- apply (merged, 1, approxfun,
                 wl = wl (merged), new.wl = unique (wl (merged)),
                 new.wavelength = "new.wl")
#> Error in wl(merged): Argument 'x' must be logical
merged$.
